data.title: Davon Earle - 2022 - Football
data.meta_description: Davon Earle (5) DB  - Redshirt Junior Year Highlights (2022): Appeared in one game this season for the Saints…Tied for second on the team with one forced fumble…Made
data.text:
Redshirt Junior Year Highlights (2022): Appeared in one game this season for the Saints…Tied for second on the team with one forced fumble…Made three solo tackles.

Junior Highlights (2021): Played in seven games for the Saints. Had six solo tackles and nine assisted tackles. Also recorded an interception and a tackle for loss.

Sophomore Highlights (2020):

Played in five games for the Saints...Had a total of six solo tackles.

First-year Highlights (2018):

Played in five games for the Saints...Had a total of two solo tackles.

High School Highlights:

Davon earned four letters from West Orange High School under head coach Bob Head...senior year Davon was the defensive MVP as well as the team captain.
